video.title: Inside the American Mob
video.synopsis: This documentary series reveals the secret world of the American Mafia via archival footage and first-person accounts from law enforcers and mafiosi.

episodes.synopsis: In the early 1970s, the American Mafia ruled the streets of New York City, but a new generation of FBI agents is about to change the game.
episodes.title: Stayin' Alive in the '70s

episodes.synopsis: In 1978, American law enforcement is at war with the mob, but the FBI has a secret weapon: agent Joe Piston, who has infiltrated the Bonanno family.
episodes.title: Operation Donnie Brasco

episodes.synopsis: In 1980, one of Philadelphia's most successful Mafia bosses, Angelo Bruno, is assassinated, igniting a war between the New York and Philly mobs.
episodes.title: New York-Philly War

episodes.synopsis: It's 1983, and the U.S. Attorney in New York City, Rudolph Giuliani, sets out to prove the existence of the Mafia Commission -- and take it down.
episodes.title: Taking Down the Mob

episodes.synopsis: It's 1986, and with most of the Mafia family bosses in jail, it's every man for himself. One gangster, John Gotti, sees chaos as an opportunity.
episodes.title: Rise & Fall of Gotti

episodes.synopsis: It's 1993, and the American mob has reached a low point. The Bath Avenue crew ushers in a violent new era where the bloodshed gets out of hand.
episodes.title: End Game
